Text: Fejutʼochu Abib, kʼuwe̩ ki fʼElaloji de ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩; todu ef ochu Abib le̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ mʼe̩ du kwʼIjipti dufu odu.
Uwe̩ ki kʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini abe̩k amokuno̩ kwef ujo̩ wa akpa Elaloji ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ef uña ki Jihofa adu kʼi je̩ ñw odu-wñ dodo omo̩.

E̩ ki je̩ akala kʼo̩jo̩wu kpe̩gwanyʼu manyʼe-le̩ n; o̩jo̩ mebie oñ uwe̩ aje̩ akala ki ma nʼo̩jo̩wu efu n manyʼu, owñ chʼakala e-o̩bata todu uwe̩ kwʼane̩ Ijipti dufu wa unaju, unaju—todu kʼuwe̩ ki dibekado o̩jo̩ kʼe̩ kwʼane̩ Ijipti dufu o̩jo̩ du kʼudeju-we̩ kade.
Ama ki la li o̩jo̩wu ugbo we̩ ejefu alo̩me̩ ane̩-we̩ du gbogbo wʼo̩jo̩ mebie le̩ n; e̩la du kʼe̩ du kpa e̩gba ane̩ o̩jo̩ ejodudu le̩, abo̩ gbogbo nyʼodudu n.
I nʼugbo kʼuwe̩ akpa e̩wñ Elaloji le̩ ejefu alaku e-we̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩ n;
chai ugbo ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu kʼi je̩ ñw odu-wñ dodo o̩mo̩, o̩mo̩ uwe̩ akpa e̩wñ Elaloji e̩gbʼane̩-wñ, abu kʼolu atunyʼane̩, iko kʼe̩ kwʼIjipti dufu wa le̩.
Uwe̩ ki la hiʼi kʼe̩ je̩ uña ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu; tak odudu-wñ uwe̩ arida kʼe̩ nyʼef unyabo-we̩.
Uwe̩ ki je̩ akala kʼo̩jo̩wu ma dʼo̩ n gbogbo o̩jo̩ me̩fa; o̩jo̩ e̩kebie-wñ ma ada ujeju eju e̩kpa ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩; uwe̩ ki che uko̩lo̩ du o̩jo̩ le̩ n.
E̩ nafʼo̩jo̩ mebie ugbo mebie kaluka jo̩; e̩ ki chane̩ o̩jo̩ mebie ugbo mebie le̩ ekaluka iko kʼe̩ chane̩ ekpa o̩ka-we̩ ababa.
Tak uwe̩ ki de uje̩wñ uyo̩ e-o̩jo̩ mebie ebie le̩ ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, uwe̩ ki gʼe̩do̩la-we̩ kʼe̩wñ kʼo̩wo̩ atu wa alu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ de̩nyo̩ ñw e̩;

tak uwe̩ ki do̩mo̩ ayo̩ eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, owñ chʼuwe̩ kpai o̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai o̩ma-we̩ onobule̩ kpai adu-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai adu-we̩ onobule̩ kpai e̩ne̩ Lifai kʼi dʼef aku aku-we̩ kpai ilowa kpai e̩ne̩ ki ma nʼata n kpai o̩yaukuo̩ko̩ ku ma jʼefu-we̩ le̩, uña e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu kʼi je̩ ñw odu-wñ dodo o̩mo̩.
Uwe̩ ki la dibekado ka kʼuwe̩ chʼadu Ijipti; uwe̩ ki la fejutʼo̩ kʼe̩ che tʼeju e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-i.
Uwe̩ ki fʼuje̩wñ e-ebu emu de o̩jo̩ mebie e̩gba kʼe̩ mʼe̩wñ-we̩ ko wʼunyi kwʼoj ajita ugwo̩ka-we̩ kpai kwef aguo̩ko̩lo̩ omi achiwebe̩te̩ma-we̩;

uwe̩ ki la yo̩ ef uje̩wñ-we̩ le̩, tʼuwe̩ tʼo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ tʼo̩ma-we̩ onobule̩ kpai adu-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai adu-we̩ onobule̩, kpai e̩ne̩ Lifai kpai ilowa kpai e̩ne̩ ki ma nʼata n kpai o̩yaukuo̩ko̩ ku ma jʼef aku aku-we̩.

O̩jo̩ mebie uwe̩ ki de uje̩wñ uyo̩ ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ uña e-ki Jihofa adu; todabu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ade̩nyo̩ ñw e̩ ef unawo e̩wñ-we̩ chaka kpai ef uko̩lo̩ o̩wo̩-we̩ chaka, oñ e̩do̩-we̩ abo̩ ogbolo.

Aboke̩le̩-we̩ chaka akwo jo̩ ejugede o̩gba Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ uña e-kʼi adu le̩ onu me̩ta o̩do̩ʼka: owñ chʼoko uje̩wñ e-akala kʼo̩jo̩wu ma do̩ n, kpai oko uje̩wñ e-ebie ebie le̩, kpai oko uje̩wñ e-ebu emu le̩. Ama ki la jo̩ ejugede o̩gba Jihofa o̩wo̩ ofo n;
e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ akʼe̩wñ wa alu kʼo̩wo̩-wñ atu, alu kʼe̩nyo̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ du ñw e̩ de̩.
Uwe̩ ki chi amakajo̩ kpai amako̩takada jo̩ aku aku-we̩ du e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩, alu kʼo̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu-we̩ de̩; ama ki nʼajo̩ o̩kpakpa kʼajo̩ amone̩-i.
Uwe̩ ki rʼoji ajo̩ da n; uwe̩ ki nʼe̩nejuma n; uwe̩ ki gbʼo̩ko̩ ugwa n, todu o̩ko̩ ugwa akpa eju anibe fo̩, i la agu o̩la e̩no̩kpakpa ji.
O̩kpakpa e-o̩kpakpa uwe̩ atʼo̩ ubi, kʼuwe̩ ki deju, kʼe̩ jʼane̩ e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩ le̩.
Uwe̩ ki dʼoli du gbe̩ ki chʼAshe̩ra kʼi me̩ru ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ kʼuwe̩ ache le̩ n.
Uwe̩ ki la du ojibo kʼi chʼe̩wñ ulaka Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ dago n.
